#summary 2-principles 4 enterprise application programmers

= Introduction =

Principle 1:  TrimPath
  * eschew server-side UI technologies
  * de-couple/separation of UI from server
  * services

Principle 2: Enterprise
  * Java 
  * Spring toolkit technology
  * Focus on creating services,  rather than binding UI to services on server-side
